overview: Mr. Devine is primarily responsible for the direction and growth of TSEG. He is passionate about optimization and developing true partnerships with our clients whereby we become a key component in their success. He has been called in as an expert consultant for Waller, Lansden, Dortch & Davis, LLP (one of the most respected law firms in the country) in a web-based intellectual property infringement case. Prior to founding The Search Engine Guys, LLC. Mr. Devine served as V.P. Sales for one of the largest privately held Legal Online Directories. He has been called as a consultant to Fortune 500 companies with respect to site architecture, search engine marketing and overall direction.
